name: Titanium.UI.iOS.SystemButton
summary: A set of constants for creating standard iOS system buttons.

constants.name: ACTION
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: ACTIVITY
constants.summary: Use with systemButton to create an activity indicator that can be used in navigation bars and toolbars.
constants.description: When visible, the activity indicator is already started.

constants.name: ADD
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: BOOKMARKS
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: CAMERA
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: CANCEL
constants.description:
This button is displayed as a bordered button with localized text.

The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: COMPOSE
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: CONTACT_ADD
constants.description: The resulting button is not restricted to use in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: DISCLOSURE
constants.description: The resulting button is not restricted to use in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: DONE
constants.description:
This button is displayed as a bordered button with localized text.

The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: EDIT
constants.description:
This button is displayed as a bordered button with localized text.

The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: FAST_FORWARD
constants.summary: Use with systemButton to specify a Fast Forward button.
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: FIXED_SPACE
constants.summary: Use with systemButton to create a fixed-width blank space for spacing items in toolbars.
constants.description: Only the width property is used when this value is set.

constants.name: FLEXIBLE_SPACE
constants.summary: Use with systemButton to create a flexible blank space for spacing items in toolbars.
constants.description: The space is distributed equally between the other items. Other item properties are ignored when this value is set.

constants.name: INFO_DARK
constants.summary: Use with style to specify a dark-colored Info button.
constants.description: The resulting button is not restricted to use in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: INFO_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with style to specify a light-colored Info button.
constants.description: The resulting button is not restricted to use in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: ORGANIZE
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: PAUSE
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: PLAY
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: REFRESH
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: REPLY
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: REWIND
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: SAVE
constants.description:
This button is displayed as a bordered button with localized text.

The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: STOP
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.

constants.name: TRASH
constants.description: The resulting button can only be used in navigation bars and toolbars.
